cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.model

Class PlayerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.model.PlayerManager

  • public class PlayerManager
extends Object
    This is model for accessing Player and Sections entities and the database.
    Author:
    Matěj Bartoň (bartom47@fel.cvut.cz)

      • createNewPlayer

        public Player createNewPlayer(Users user,
                              int activeSectionsIndex,
                              Boolean concertMasterFlag)
        Creates new player relation in the database for user entity given.
        Parameters:
        user - - a Users entity
        activeSectionsIndex - - a int value of index in PlayerManagaer.activeSections
        concertMasterFlag - - a Boolean flag if the user will become concert master
        Returns:
        new Player entity

      • removePlayer

        public Player removePlayer(Users user)
                    throws NotAPlayerException
        Removes player entity from database for user entity given.
        Parameters:
        user - - a Users entity
        Returns:
        the removed Player entity
        Throws:
        NotAPlayerException - when given user is not a player
